title: Complete ReactJS
details: Perfect starting point for any React beginner. Learn the basics of modern React by solving 140+ interactive coding challenges and building eight fun projects. Create accounts, unlock accounts, mine, transact, transfer Ethers, and check balances.
author: Bob Ziroll

title: Javascript Pro
details: This course provides a broad overview of blockchain technology, exploring the Bitcoin protocol followed by the Ethereum protocol. You will be equipped to create nodes on your personal Ethereum blockchain, unlock accounts, mine, transact, transfer Ethers, and check balances.
author: Per Harald Borgen

title: Web Design & Development
details: Learn to build your very first web pages with this course on HTML and CSS. Created by Kevin Powell, one of the most popular HTML & CSS instructors on the web. Learning HTML and CSS to design and build professional projects after successful completion.
author: Kevin Powell

title: Digital Marketing
details: Become an expert in Digital Marketing with certifications in social media, SEO, Google Ads, Google Analytics, and many more.
author: Shanklin Langford

title: CCNA and Networking
details: Prepare for the CCNA exam with this comprehensive course on networking fundamentals and exam prep lab courses.
author: Aric Rindfleisch

title: Graphics Design
details: Learn graphic design tools to create attractive templates. The course is led by successful mentors who are active in both freelancing and professional careers.
author: Mike Yao
